name: useResizeObserver
description: Custom hook that observes the size of an element using the [`ResizeObserver API`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ResizeObserver).

schema.name: box
schema.description: The box model to use for the ResizeObserver.

schema.name: onResize
schema.description: When using `onResize`, the hook doesn't re-render on element size changes; it delegates handling to the provided callback.

schema.name: ref
schema.description: The ref of the element to observe.

returns.name: height
returns.description: The height of the observed element.

returns.name: width
returns.description: The width of the observed element.
